input.code:
//visualization of the sparse data matrix
Matrix((0 until rows.length).map(row => (0 until cols.length).map(col => if (data(col).contains(row)) 1.0 else 0.0).toSeq).toSeq, rows.map(t => t._1+","+t._2), cols.map(_.toString))

input.code:
val entityPairEmbeddings = rows.zipWithIndex.map(t => (0, t._1.toString, thetaStar.pairs(t._2).asArray.toSeq)).toSeq

val relationEmbeddings = cols.zipWithIndex.map(t => (1, t._1.toString, thetaStar.relations(t._2).asArray.toSeq)).toSeq

//visualization of embeddings
Custom.Vectors(entityPairEmbeddings ++ relationEmbeddings)
